document_data.title: The City of Waterdeep Trail Map
document_data.author: Uncredited
document_data.mainbody:
'''''The City of Waterdeep Trail Map''''' is a 1{{st}}-edition ''Advanced Dungeons & Dragons'' accessory that was set in the ''[[Forgotten Realms]]''. 
{{Quote|''A fantasy city can be a vast, sprawling, mazelike place. Main streets turn into blind alleys. Thriving markets adjoin crime-infested slums. The wise traveler avoids problems by consulting his Trail Map.''

''TM4 maps out not only the grand city of [[Waterdeep]], but also two other cities featured in the Avatar trilogy: [[Shadowdale]], fabled home of [[Elminster Aumar|Elminster the Sage]], and [[Tantras]], a bustling port on the [[Dragon Reach]].''

''All maps are full color, printed on a 36" by 57" sheets suitable for use in gaming or as a wall poster.''}}
